issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

[INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/24/11 08:14 e1cb22a) All supported platforms.

1.invoke facebook log in via mashups > facebook > log in
2.check the log in button

results: no text on sign in buton (1.6 - 2.3.1)

{html}
fields.summary: Android: facebook log in missing text on button

comments.body:
{html}

Can you check this again today -- even with the same build as yesterday. We don't have any control over this dialog -- it's a web page served up by Facebook. And today the button seems to display text fine. I think they must've screwed up something on their end and then fixed it.

But mine appears in German, so I'd like someone over there to try it too, maybe either Don or Thomas.

{html}

{html}

sorry BIll, its working fine today, closing against [INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/28/11 08:32 e46f49a) galaxy tab (2.2.2) and nexus s (2.3.2)

{html}
